title: Value
description: Value is a headless utility component that provides you a reactive variable in template. This is useful when you want to have a state in HTML you passed to slot.

default.title: Default
default.text: By default `VaValue` provides reactive boolean value with `false` by default. Reactive variable passed to `#default="v"` slot bind and can be accessed or changed like `ref`. Bellow is example of toggle value on text click `v.value = !v.value`.

withInputs.title: Inline editing
withInputs.text: Great example where `VaValue` can be useful is `v-for` or `v-slot`. In example below we render form data with `v-for` and for each item `VaValue` creates state, which we use to change if it is in edit mode or not.

string.title: Default value
string.text: You can pass any type of value to `VaValue` and it will be reactive. In example below we pass `string` and `object` values and use it to render text.
